title: Remarks by President Biden Before Marine One Departure | The White House
content: South Lawn10:09 A.M. EDTTHE PRESIDENT: Puerto Rico. I’m heading to Puerto Rico because they haven’t been taken very good care of. They’ve been trying like hell to catch up from the last hurricane. I want to see the state of affairs today and make sure we push everything we can. Thanks.10:09 A.M. EDT
